Posts.Content: Oct 23, 2013 01:45PM KarenMc wrote: Lazeechic, This is very encouraging. I was diagnosed Stage 4 mets to liver and lungs in January this year. I have had 28 chemo treatments (Taxol) this year and just recently switched to Afinitor and Aromostat. 2 weeks ago I had mapping done for radioembolization. I finally accepted the fact that if I lived 5 years I should consider myself lucky, but you have given me new hope. Are you currently still in treatment? If so, what? KarenMc (I joined several months ago, but have not logged on for some time.)
Posts.Title: liver mets - are you out there? Huntsco Mamita49

Posts.Content: Oct 24, 2013 05:26PM KarenMc wrote: I was dx stage 4 mets to liver and lungs in January 2013 when my lungs collapsed. I am having radioembolization on November 5th I had the mapping done October 8th. Does anyone have any experience with radioembolization?
